text:
"Malcolm & Marie" is an upcoming American drama movie, written and directed by Sam Levinson. It stars John David Washington and Zendaya as the title characters.
It will be released on February 5, 2021, by Netflix.
Release.
In September 2020, Netflix bought the movie's distribution rights for $30 million, paying a higher price than companies such as HBO, A24 and Searchlight Pictures. It will be released on February 5, 2021.
